steps: decided to work at a ramen shop
submit resume and cover letter to the ramen shop
wait for the ramen shop to get in touch

branching_info.branching_step: submit resume and cover letter to the ramen shop

branching_info.option 2: submit the resume and cover letter online
freeform_ra: wants to show enthusiasm for the job
